goals.description: Increased number of visits to the garden

system.task: Identify flowers in pictures taken at the garden
system.usage_context: The model will be part of an application that runs on a device loaned out by a botanical garden so that visitors can identify flowers during their visit.

model.deployment_platform: Model will be deployed as part of the Garden Buddy App on a small device loaned out to garden visitors.
model.capability_deployment_mechanism: The model will expose an API that will be called from the flower identification application.

output_specification.name: Flower label
output_specification.description: Number linking to name of the flower present in the image

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: Regardless of the location in the garden, the model can correctly identify the correct flowers
system_requirements.measure: at least 90% of the time

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture that is a bit blurry
system_requirements.response: he model successfully identifies flowers
system_requirements.measure: at the same rate as non-blurry images

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at a garden
system_requirements.source: the Garden Buddy application running on a loaned device
system_requirements.response: These devices are known to sometimes lose a channel (i.e., RGB channel). The model successfully identifies flowers
system_requirements.measure: at the same rate as full images

system_requirements.stimulus: The model running on the loaned device receives pictures taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: The loaned devices are small, inexpensive devices with limited CPU power, as well as limited memory and disk space (512 MB and 150 MB, respectively).
system_requirements.measure: The model executes on the loaned device without any errors due to unavailable resources

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: The application indicates main features that were used to recognize the flower, as part of the educational experience.
system_requirements.measure: The app displays the original image highlighting the most informative features in flower identification, in addition to the flower name

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: The model identifies the flower correctly
system_requirements.measure: with an accuracy of at least 90%

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: Model correctly processes inputs and produces outputs
system_requirements.measure: according to established input and output specifications without exceptions

system_requirements.stimulus: The ML pipeline receives a picture taken at the garden that does not conform to the input specification
system_requirements.response: The model does not process the input
system_requirements.measure: and instead the ML pipeline produces -99 as the output and creates a log entry with the tag "Model - Input Validation Error - <Input>, where <Input> is the original input

system_requirements.stimulus: The ML pipeline receives a picture that corresponds to an OOD input
system_requirements.response: The model will process the input
system_requirements.measure: and the ML pipeline will create a log entry with the tag "Model - Input OOD Error - <Input>, where <Input> is the original input

system_requirements.stimulus: The ML pipeline detects an output distribution change
system_requirements.source: the output produced by the model
system_requirements.response: The ML pipeline will create a log entry
system_requirements.measure: with the tag "Model - Output Confidence Error - <Output>, where <Output> is the output produced by the model that triggered the condition

system_requirements.stimulus: Model running on the loaned device receives a picture
system_requirements.response: The time for the model to return an output
system_requirements.measure: is no more than two seconds

system_requirements.stimulus: The model receives a picture taken at the garden
system_requirements.response: The ML component should demonstrate consistently similar performance for pictures from the same garden from day to day
system_requirements.measure: such that garden visitors and garden employees have consistent experiences using the app

system_requirements.stimulus: The ML component will need to be retrained. During which notifications
system_requirements.response: The ML model produces
system_requirements.measure: the same results on the test data set regardless of the training data used to train the ML component

system_requirements.stimulus: The Garden Buddy application may be used in a VR environment, and as such the ML component may receive synthetic flower image
system_requirements.response: The performance of the ML model in the new VR  environment
system_requirements.measure: should be similar to that in the current garden environment

system_requirements.stimulus: The developed ML component is handed over to the operations for integration into the ML-enabled system
system_requirements.response: The delivery of the ML component will include a test data set and corresponding component outputs. During integration testing of the ML component
system_requirements.measure: the differences between provided outputs and actual outputs should be less than 0.25%

system_requirements.stimulus: A new developer is joining the Garden Buddy team
system_requirements.response: The implementation and design choices are easily understood by a new developer after reading the code and documentation
system_requirements.measure: after 2 person/days

system_requirements.stimulus: A new flower is introduced into the garden
system_requirements.source: the garden staff updating the garden and hosting traveling botanical exhibits
system_requirements.response: A new trained ML component, trained on updated training data and number of output labels,
system_requirements.measure: will be available no later than 8 hours after the development team is notified

system_requirements.stimulus: The need for the app to run with a new input format for the ML component
system_requirements.source: the operations/maintenance team needs to changing input data processing pipelines as a new device type is used for the Garden Buddy app
system_requirements.response: The new sensor's data input  processing pipeline is to replace the old input data processing pipeline
system_requirements.measure: and the total effort involved is less than 4 hours of operations staff time

system_requirements.stimulus: The team needs to quickly change the ML model being run by the application
system_requirements.source: as an advancement in the field has occurred that necessitates an update in the algorithm used to generate the ML component
system_requirements.response: The model switch change over is made
system_requirements.measure: and the total effort involved is less than 16 hours of development and operation teams' time

system_requirements.stimulus: The ML component needs to be retrained
system_requirements.source: as an environment necessitating a new model has occurred
system_requirements.response: The development team kicks off the ML model retraining process
system_requirements.measure: and the total personnel time devoted to kick off, monitoring and checking the output of the retraining process is no more than 1 hour

system_requirements.stimulus: The decision to produce a new app, with only changing who it is marketed to, user interface, and platform is issued
system_requirements.response: The existing garden buddy ML component is used in the new app
system_requirements.measure: with limited changes to the ML component code were needed to integrate the ML component into the new app, totaling no more than 1/2 a development day
